Articles.Content:
I have no idea where this would go, so please move it as necessary.

 

I had this idea, either as a Windows program or in Mod form, so you can easily make new planets for KSP, that would output Kopernicus config files, and I made a mockup of it.

I didn't include some things, like atmospheric density sliders for one, planet size sliders....etc.  but the basic parts are all there.  Would anyone be interested in this kind of thing?  Note, I can't program it because I have no idea how, this is just an idea....but I would if I knew how though!
